description: The judicial island of the World Government, known as the island that never sleeps due to constant daylight. Home to CP9 and the Gateway to Impel Down and Marine Headquarters.

keyEvents.title: Oimo and Kashii Block Marines at Enies Lobby
keyEvents.description: The giants Oimo and Kashii actively prevent Marines from advancing through Enies Lobby, still angry about being deceived for 50 years.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the turning of former Enies Lobby guards against the World Government.

statusHistory.reason: The Straw Hats' assault on Enies Lobby is underway

name.japanese: エニエス・ロビー裁判所

description: The main courthouse building of Enies Lobby where the Just Eleven Jurymen and Chief Justice Baskerville preside. The Straw Hats assembled on its rooftop to call out to Robin.

keyEvents.title: Complete Straw Hat Crew Assembles on Courthouse Roof
keyEvents.description: All six Straw Hat Pirates present at Enies Lobby stand together on the courthouse roof, facing Robin and CP9 across the waterfall divide.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most iconic visual moments in One Piece, showing the crew's united determination to save Robin.

keyEvents.title: Just Eleven Jurymen Defeated
keyEvents.description: Nami and Chopper defeat the Just Eleven Jurymen inside the courthouse.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the Straw Hats' progress through Enies Lobby's defenses.

statusHistory.reason: Location where the Straw Hats assembled

description: The main tower of Enies Lobby where Spandam's office is located. Robin and Franky were held here before escaping to the balcony. A waterfall separates it from the courthouse.

keyEvents.title: Franky's Coup de Boo Escape
keyEvents.description: Franky uses Coup de Boo to blast himself and Robin out of the Tower of Justice onto the balcony.
keyEvents.significance: Enables Robin to see Luffy and sets up the emotional confrontation.

keyEvents.title: CP9 Members Assemble on Tower of Justice
keyEvents.description: The CP9 members gather on the Tower of Justice balcony, facing the assembled Straw Hats across the waterfall.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the upcoming battles between the Straw Hats and CP9.

statusHistory.reason: Location of Spandam's office and CP9 headquarters
